event.title: 2001, the demographic details of Parigi mandal is as follows

data.event: According to Indian census, 2001, the demographic details of Parigi mandal is as follows: Total Population: 52,852 in 11,187 Households Male Population: 27,287 and Female Population: 25,565 Children Under 6-years of age: 7,339 (Boys - 3,816 and Girls - 3,523) Total Literates: 25,650 Parigi is located at 13.9069°N 77.4572°E﻿ / 13.9069; 77.4572.
